context: Analyze this supine hip opener pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Happy Baby (Ananda Balasana) Lying on back holding feet with knees to armpits. Consider the Hip opening, lower back release, playfulness. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Lying on back holding feet with knees to armpits
practitioner.primaryFocus: Hip opening, lower back release, playfulness

specificNeeds: Hip opening, lower back release, playfulness
